Antony J. Blinken

Secretary of State

Biography

Antony Blinken was born to Judith (n√©e Frehm) Blinken and Donald Blinken. His mother, Judith, later became a UNESCO special envoy for cultural diplomacy in 2017, while his father, Donald, was a venture capitalist who served as the U.S. ambassador to Hungary from 1994 to 1997. After his parents divorced in 1971, Judith married Samuel Pisar, a Holocaust survivor and renowned lawyer.
